text:
Hello everyone :wave:
I'm Blazej
Currently working with <https://www.monterail.com/|Monterail>, a software agency from Wroclaw, Poland -- I'm doing content marketing and everything around there. I also don't shy away from freelance work (some of the companies I worked with: Uber Eats, Apple, Donkey Crew).
I love creative writing, the nature, good books and talks, and sharing knowledge.
Can't wait to connect!
Cheers!

text:
Good morning from Toronto everyone! :flag-ca:

I'm Jordy Fujiwara. My career is a mix of digital marketing, writing, storytelling and very recently, online education. My background is in psychology and business, and my past decade has been about 50% agency, 30% client side and 20% FT freelance. I've always had a gaggle of side gigs on the go, including some fun startups and a few novels. This has amounted to being exposed to a lot of industries across every size of business imaginable.

Hoping I can create some great connections here, learning from everyone else, and contribute and support folks in return. :partyparrot:

elements.text: Good morning from Toronto everyone!

Hoping I can create some great connections here, learning from everyone else, and contribute and support folks in return.

text: Hello! My name is Theresa and I do communications/PR/content marketing at a B2B SaaS company in DC called Quorum! We sell public affairs software—so helping lobbying and advocacy professionals with legislative tracking, stakeholder engagement, and grassroots advocacy. Over the past three years I've built Quorum's content marketing function and will likely be growing the team over the next year, so excited to learn from all of you about improving our contetn function as the team grows!

text: Hey everyone! I’ve been lurking for a few months, but figured I’d say hello in honor of starting a new job today. I’m Jordan, a content manager at Animalz! Looking forward to learning and connecting :slightly_smiling_face:

text: I was a marketing consultant and freelance writer for a small tech startup (which is no longer with us, #rip) while working various odd jobs. I taught English in France, coached tennis, and helped little campers find the restroom before disaster struck (about 80% success rate on that last one)

text: Hi Everyone, good morning from smoky San Francisco! I'm Jen and I work in marketing. I'm really excited to be introduced to this group by <@U010F3QF2P8>. I'm in need of a freelancer to help with our content marketing needs at GoCardless. I'll post something in the job-listing channel, but if you have experience writing for Fintech companies, that's great - send me a message! *Bonus if you also have experience writing about the payments industry! Looking forward to chatting!

text: Hi, I'm Aditya, a freelance content marketer from India. After almost a decade in consulting, I stumbled into the world of content marketing less than a year ago. Thank you for having me here. I currently write articles, lead magnets and emails for a couple of startups based out of Australia and Canada. Looking to level up! And of course looking forward to making a few new friends here...

text: Hi everyone! I just joined this community and I am excited to be here to learn, help and connect with everyone. I'm a B2B SaaS writer in the marketing niche. I started my freelancing career designing websites but quickly fell in love with writing. Looking forward to getting to know everyone :slightly_smiling_face:
